data.approach: Analyzing handleInputKeydown function to determine if there is any difference between Enter and Ctrl-Enter behavior

summary: Found NO difference between Enter and Ctrl+Enter - both submit
findings: Line 4064 checks e.key Enter and not e.shiftKey
ctrlKey is NOT checked - modifier is ignored
Both Enter and Ctrl+Enter match and submit

summary: Added Ctrl+Enter to submit AND collapse sessions panel
Modified handleInputKeydown to detect Ctrl+Enter (or Cmd+Enter on Mac)
Added onCtrlEnterSubmit callback prop to SessionCard
Investigated input submission behavior for Enter and Ctrl+Enter in session card user input
Confirmed submission mechanism for task input handling
Verified no significant functional differences between key events
